Text.val: 04.02.2014 GB SCR18697 Removed the FIN part and added additional test to the part NAW
27.11.2013 GB SCR18551 Changed GNRD_DIRECTORYTYPE = 88 in GNRD_DIRECTORYTYPE = 135
01.07.2013 GB SCR18213 Added third field to the print
11.01.2013 GB SCR17850 Changed GNRD_DIRECTORYPATH from 11 to 88
29.11.2012 SH SCR17738 Changed back one virtual (SQL output parameter) back to Alpha becasue of cast to char in DSQL
09.08.2007 SH SCR12786 Removed hardcoded init = 'NL' from pi.Country; Added
missing tests on DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY = PI.COUNTRY and DEBH_DATDELETED = null
11.04.2007 AK SCR12323 canceled the check on DEBB_ACTINVAH
04.04.2007 AK SCR12323 splited the file into two files NAW and FIN
09.03.2007 AK SCR12323 trim the colums before output
Get the path for the files
Adding the name to the path

STP.TXT: M I S S I N G P A R A M E T E R / S
GNRD - G E N E R A L D I R E C T O R Y (ENTRY 135) I S E M P T Y

SQL_STMT_U.val: select dhic_id, debh_no, cast('NAW' as char(3)) from :1/debh join :1/dhic on dhic_infs_code=':2' and dhic_debh = debh_no where DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY = ':3' and DEBH_DATDELETED is null and exists(select * from :1/debc, :1/admn where debc_debh = debh_no and debc_datdeleted is null and admn_no = debc_admno and admn_testclients = 'N') order by 2
select dhic_id from :1/dhic , :1/debh where dhic_debh = debh_no and debh_no = :2 and DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY = 'NL' and dhic_infs_code='IS'
